I went back to my room to charge my phone and on\nthe way back, I looked up at the night sky.%K%P
'What a nice night.'%K%P
The constellation Pegasus filled the autumn sky.%K%P
The fall insects played their cool music,\nannouncing the changing season.%K%P
'She can't go home at this hour...'%K%P
Akane might be a goddess, but she's still a\ngirl.%K%P
You couldn't say it's entirely safe.%K%P
'Maybe she should stay the night.'%K%P
Thinking this, I turned my gaze back toward the\ncourtyard.%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
The familiar courtyard hosted an unfamiliar\nfigure.%K%P
It was a girl, bathed in brilliant moonlight.%K%P
Her hair, black as the night, sparkled in the\nlight of the moon and the stars.%K%P
Dressed like a shrine maiden, her slender body\nand  elegant face were like a painting.%K%P
'You're a goddess, aren't you...?'%K%P
I could tell at a glance.%K%P
This girl was different from Akane, she had an\nentrancing divine beauty that pulled me in.%K%P
She was much more like the goddesses I'd seen on\nTV.%K%P
Hearing my murmur, the girl turned her eyes to\nme.%K%P
'...Oh? Might you be Sho Narumi?'%K%P
Her voice fell on my ears like the pure ringing\nof a bell.%K%P
'Um... Uh, yes, yes I am. May I ask how you know\nmy name?'%K%P
'I do apologize. I am the local earth goddess of\nKannagi, Inori Kamiki.'%K%P
'Thank you for your kind introduction.'%K%P
The local earth goddess... That must mean she's\nsomeone very important.%K%P
'But wait... The local earth goddess?! What is\nan earth goddess doing here?!'%K%P
'I have a small errand. I have special\npermission from my boss, so pardon the\nintrusion.'%K%P
She covered her mouth and gave a small laugh.\nThe gesture seemed to suit her.%K%P
She was worlds apart from a certain collapsing\ngoddess...%K%P
'An errand, was it?'%K%P
I had a feeling that I knew what this was\nabout...%K%P
I had never even dreamed that a goddess might\ncome to Tsubaki Apartments.%K%P
But tonight, a certain guest was visiting.%K%P
'I have business with Akane Tsubaki, whom I know\nto be here tonight.'%K%P
Yep, I was right.%K%P
'Was it wrong of me to bring her here?'%K%P
'Oh no, but I'm sure she has been a burden.\nAkane tends to wander off when no one is\nlooking.'%K%P
The way she put a hand on her cheek and sighed\nwas the essence of humility.%K%P
'I don't think she's been a burden.'%K%P
'Is that so? I'm glad to hear that.'%K%P
Inori was so gentle. She was very easy to talk\nto, but in a different way from Akane.%K%P
'Oh, do pardon my going on. Would you please\nshow me the way to Akane?'%K%P
'Of course. Right this way.'%K%P
I led Inori inside to find Akane.%K%P
'My name is Inori Kamiki. It's a pleasure to\nmeet you.'%K%P
Inori bowed deeply to Maika.%K%P
'Uh... My name is Maika Kunugi. The pleasure is\nmine. Sho? Why is there another goddess here?'%K%P
'She wants to talk to Akane, apparently.'%K%P
'Why Akane?'%K%P
She glanced at Akane.%K%P
Akane had turned away, her shoulders slumped as\nif her earlier cheer had never been.%K%P
Inori drew near to her.%K%P
'Akane, I've been looking for you.'%K%P
'...You didn't need to.'%K%P
'You know that's not true. You're my\nresponsibility.'%K%P
'That's not my fault, I never asked you to!'%K%P
'As you have said many times. Don't you know\nyou're causing people trouble?'%K%P
'Whatever! I'm just doing what I want! I don't\nhave to explain every little thing to you. Go\non, go away!'%K%P
Inori's expression hardened at Akane's 'shoo'\ngesture.%K%P
Huh?%K%P
One would think goddesses would be able to talk\npeacefully, but it looked like a storm was\nbrewing  here...%K%P
'A-Akane. I'm only trying to help you with your\nrehabilitation!'%K%P
'If you really want to help me, then just let me\nbe! What, are you that bored?'%K%P
'B-Bored? This is my responsibility! This is no\ngame for me!'%K%P
'Oh, I see... You're so pathetic they didn't\nwant to give you a real job.'%K%P
'Wrong! Your rehab never seems to end so I can't\ndo anything else! Once you're better, I can get\non with important patron goddess work!'%K%P
It was like a teacher arguing with a juvenile\ndelinquent...%K%P
I'd thought that goddesses were some mystical,\nelegant beings, different from humans.%K%P
But judging from the back-and-forth happening\nright here, goddesses were no different from\nhumans.%K%P
'Just shut up already! Quit going on about\n'rehab, rehab,' like it's the only word you\nknow!'%K%P
'You reeeally are a worthless pain-in-the-butt\ngoddess!'%K%P
Akane was now the angry one.%K%P
'Ugh, a blackout now?!'%K%P
As if responding to Akane's anger, the lights\nwent off and sent the room into darkness.%K%P
If Akane went off in this darkness, who knows\nwhat might happen.%K%P
I had to stop this somehow.%K%P
Suddenly, I heard the rustling of cloth and a\nfigure leapt up from the dark.%K%P
'Huh? You want a piece of me?! You'd rather me\nbow and scrape for you!'%K%P
Once my eyes were used to the dark, I could see\nInori glaring at Akane.%K%P
Huh, who was this?%K%P
Where did that meek, gentle flower of Japanese\nbeauty go?%K%P
I might have been imagining it, but it sounded\nlike rain had started to pour down outside.%K%P
'Pshaw! Like I'd ever listen to a dirt goddess\nlike you!'%K%P
'Dirt goddess?! Oh, it is ON now!'%K%P
'Hah, you're just mad because it's true, you're\nsuch a little brat!'%K%P
'Oh, I'm a little brat?! You're the one who\nthrows a tantrum every time you don't get your\nway!'%K%P
'Shove it, little Miss Conformity!'%K%P
'C-Conformity?! I'm going to get you\nrehabilitated no matter what!'%K%P
'Psh! Bring it on, if you think you can handle\nme!'%K%P
They were starting to sound like children.%K%P
I glimpsed to the side, and saw Maika staring\ndumbfounded at the goddess fight.%K%P
For the time being, if we didn't get things\nsettled down, then the discussion would go\nnowhere.%K%P
'Um, okay you two... All this shouting at night\nis--'%K%P
'Look at you, an unemployed freeloading goddess\ntalking like she's queen of the world!'%K%P
'Oh please! I'm free, I don't need to work!'%K%P
'Exactly, that's what the humans call a\nFREELOADER!'%K%P
It was no good. Neither of them would listen to\nme.%K%P
I might have to get rough, but it looked like it\nwouldn't stop until I got Akane restrained.%K%P
'Now listen up! You two have got to stop this\nfighting, all-- Wah!'%K%P
Unable to see in the dark room, I tripped over a\nchair.%K%P
'Eeek!'%K%P
'Wh-What?! Sho, are you okay?'%K%P
'I'm fine, I just ran into something.'%K%P
I had tripped, but I saved myself from falling\nby grabbing onto something.%K%P
Something soft, and that smelled good...%K%P
'Um... Mmm...'%K%P
I could hear a captivating voice very nearby,\nand straining my eyes in the dark I made out\nInori's back...%K%P
So... So this softness under my hands...%K%P
'Oh... Sho...! Please, don't squeeze so hard...'%K%P
'What?! Sho! What are you doing?!'%K%P
'No, wait! It was an accident!'%K%P
'Uhh... Sho, your fingers are moving again...'%K%P
'Get away from her right this instant, you\nidiot!'%K%P
'I-I'm so sorry!'%K%P
I should have gotten away from her like Maika\ndemanded.%K%P
But it seemed so wrong to release the blissful\nsoftness that my hands were enjoying.%K%P
'Oh, brave boy Sho! Go get her! But hey, if\nyou're going to do it, really grab on! Like\nthis!'%K%P
'Now hold on! What are you doing, Akane?!'%K%P
'Ah! Th-That tickles!'%K%P
'This is a riot to watch! And Sho is a boy,\nafter all, I bet he's enjoying it!'%K%P
And just as Akane said, I would have loved\nnothing more than to really squeeze.%K%P
It was such a rare opportunity, I really wanted\nto savor the moment.%K%P
'Sho! Hey! You let go of her right now! Get\naway!'%K%P
'Ouch!'%K%P
Just as reason and desire battled it out in my\nbrain, Maika's thump on my head helped reason\nwin... But it was close.%K%P
